entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
